name: The Secret Diary of Adrian Mole Aged 13¾
overview: Playing this game will take you through a year in the life of Adrian Mole. As you progress through the days in Adrian's diary, you will be asked to make choices for Adrian. Press a number from 1 to 3 to choose one of the options suggested. Pressing key number 4 will display the command and help system menu. This gives a list of the additional features in the game and full instructions on how to use them.
